response.overview: The events take place in the fall of 2013 after the curfew decision in Egypt, where Faten is released from prison after spending twenty years due to committing a horrific crime, and Faten is forced to spend her night with her daughter Laila, who is subjected to a second trial in search of answers to silent questions about her. To pass the night in an attempt to accept each other
response.title: Curfew
